title: Якщо чесно
overview: "Honestly" is a sitcom about a modern couple in love who live in a civil marriage. According to the plot, Andrey and Inga, played by Igor Lastochkin and Daria Petrozhytska, are in a constant gender battle and involve their parents, relatives, friends, work colleagues, and their own alter egos in their battles. However, even with their help, the protagonists do not always manage to resolve conflicts. Andriy and Inga continue to knock down their knees, debunk and accept stereotypes, and stay together despite everything.
